text: Morning all. Does anybody know if there is a way to trigger a company based workflow via the API?

The closest you can come to that is by triggering the criteria of the workflow via API. eg. setting a flag field on the company record from ‘false’ to ‘true’ which is the criteria for the workflow. There is not an API for non-contact Workflows at the moment.
Thanks Zack — will that allow us to re-enroll companies though? We want to run the workflow several times on the same company.
Yup, all you have to do is make sure in your workflow settings you allow re-enrollment if they meet the criteria again.  (you would need to flip the flag back and forth in this scenario)

Hello, does anyone know if there is a webhook for blog posts?
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Webhooks-for-Blog-Posts-Landing-Pages-Site-Pages/idi-p/17312>
Thanks Zack — that’s a great workaround. Any plans to add company workflows to the official api?

Yes, but there is a significant transition that needs to take place behind the scenes.  Contacts operates on what can now be considered the “old” platform and we need to migrate those to the new platform, but as you can imagine with all the things you can do with workflows, that’s no small task. Once everything is running on the same system and we know it’s stable, we’ll be able to open up an API for all types of workflows
Work is happening on that now, but we are proceeding very cautiously so it’s hard to provide an estimate on when this will be finished
